meanings.definition: To feel a slight prickling or stinging sensation
meanings.sent1: After sitting for a long time, my foot started tingling.
meanings.sent2: She tingled with excitement as she waited for the surprise.
meanings.sent3: The thought of ice cream made her whole body tingle with joy.
meanings.sent4: The news of her promotion sent a tingling sensation through her body.
meanings.sent5: The tingling sensation in her fingers reminded her of the cold winter air.

meanings.definition: A slight prickling or stinging sensation
meanings.sent1: The tingling in his arm made him shake it to relieve the sensation.
meanings.sent2: The tingling in her toes indicated poor circulation.
meanings.sent3: The tingling in her nose made her sneeze unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The tingling in his spine warned him of danger approaching.
meanings.sent5: The tingling in her scalp was a sign of excitement building up.
